item7: “Free cash flow” represents cash flow operations less capital expenditures, APS investments exploration data costs capitalized. Management believes free cash flow important liquidity measure company useful investors management measure ability generate cash. Once business needs obligations met, cash can used reinvest company future growth return shareholders through dividend payments share repurchases. Free cash flow does not represent residual cash flow available discretionary expenditures.
item2: Capital investments (consisting capital expenditures, APS investments exploration data capitalized) $1.7 billion during first nine months 2025 compared $1.9 billion during first nine months 2024. Capital investments full year 2025 expected approximately $2.4 billion. January 2025, SLB announced 3.6% increase its quarterly cash dividend $0.275 per share outstanding common stock $0.285 per share, beginning dividend payable April 2025. Dividends paid during first nine months 2025 2024 $1.2 billion $1.1 billion, respectively.
